title: 'The white skirt is good'
body: 'I ordered two skirts from them - white and black. the white one was great
column5: the cloth quality and zipper were good. the black skirt was of bad cloth quality and had a broken zipper. both the skirts were 28 but had different fit. the white fit perfect while as the black was just a bit too small. Love the white skirt'

title: 'Very Very Bad replacement item.'
body: 'The first skirt was of decent quality cloth
column5: the issue was size . So I exchanged it but in return got a very very substandard product. The cloth quality is downright CHEAP. No option on the app to return it.ðŸ˜¡'

title: 'Faulty product
column5: 'Worst quality. zipper was broken when the parcel arrived'
